stepAnswer: 10 pounds of raisins and 15 pounds of nuts
stepTitle: Henning is mixing raisins and nuts to make 25 pounds of trail mix. Raisins cost $4.50 a pound and nuts cost $8 a pound. If Henning wants his cost for the trail mix to be $6.60 a pound, how many pounds of raisins and how many pounds of nuts should he use?
choices: 15 pounds of raisins and 15 pounds of nuts
10 pounds of raisins and 20 pounds of nuts
10 pounds of raisins and 15 pounds of nuts
10 pounds of raisins and 25 pounds of nuts
